div.p: If locationtion of element attribute is expressed, tagg it as WRITING PRODUCTION PSERIALIZATION . It specifies the manner in which the work was serialized through its two associated values, volumeForm and periodicalForm. The first records the work's sequential appearance in a set of volumes; the second in magazines or other periodicals.

div.codeblock: <PSERIALIZATION FORMOFSERIALIZATION="periodicalForm">Anna Leonowen's work was first serialized in the Atlantic Monthly. <PSERIALIZATION>
